content: finished bowl through a hot wash in the washing machine with an old tennis ball or pair of jeans for extra agitation we have endeavoured to ensure these instructions are accurate and complete however we cannot be held responsible for variations in individual work human error or if yarn other than recom- mended is used if you have any queries please contact us at tangled@tangledyarns com au this pattern is protected by copyright © and cannot be copied under any circumstances items knitted from this pattern cannot be used for commercial purposes page 2 of 2
